scripts.dev:client: rimraf dist/client && nodemon --delay 0.5 --ext .ts --watch client --watch shared --exec 'tsc --project tsconfig.client.json && node --enable-source-maps dist/client/client/main.js'
scripts.dev:server: rimraf dist/server && nodemon --delay 0.5 --ext .ts --watch server --watch shared --exec 'tsc --project tsconfig.server.json && node --enable-source-maps dist/server/server/main.js'
